name: Rubik's Fugue
description:
Rubik's Fugue is a game in which you have to travel inside a level composed by faces that you have the power to rotate.

Your goal is to reach the black hole contained in one of the rooms of the level, use the holes,  doors and other objects inside the rooms to travel between them! 

Will you be able to do that in a short time? 

Tips

Match two elements of the same type to be able to use them and traverse them.

Controls Use WASD to move the character SPACE to make the character float LEFT CLICK to drag and rotate the faces of the levels RIGHT CLICK to move the camera ESC to pause the game
